description: a(n) = least composite number such that sigma(a(n)+n!) = sigma(a(n))+n! where sigma() = A000203.
mathematica: L = {}; Do[i = 1; While[ ! ((Plus @@ Divisors[i + j! ] == j! + Plus @@ Divisors[i]) && ! PrimeQ[i]), i++ ]; L = Append[L, i], {j, 2, 13}]; L (from Vit Planocka)
author: _Labos Elemer_, May 29 2000
extensions: More terms from Vit Planocka (planocka(AT)mistral.cz), Sep 22 2003
